website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive cajon is comfortable and adjustable, although some find it to be on the small side.
pros: Handcrafted from smooth walnut and birch
Solid build, easy to use, and affordable
Comes with an instruction video and built-in silicone seat pad
cons: Some feel that this cajon is too small and should be taller

customer_reviews.title: Spot on!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Lightweight, well constructed and easy to transport. Different wood for the face and the sides offer additional sounds/textures. I think this is a total bargain for the cost. Got the product quickly. Highly recommended, very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Gonzalez (kengon)

customer_reviews.title: Nice, well priced Cajon
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Christmas. He is a drummer and was elected to have portable drum to carry with him. It has an amazing sound and tone quality. It is a beautiful wood.
customer_reviews.author: Wifeofskater

customer_reviews.title: So excited!!
customer_reviews.text: I have just received and unboxed my Soundwave Cajon Box Drum, I was surprised to see the size and dimensions of the cajon, I know it's a compact design but I never expected it to be this cute, to which I find it to be just the right size for a not so tall person like me, LOL!! I tried playing the cajon, the bass was fine but the snare part is a bit out of tune, and I think that's where the soundwave instruments link comes in handy for setting up the cajon.
customer_reviews.author: Jhei Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Good price for quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his Christmas gift! It does what it’s made to do and he likes being able to adjust the sound
customer_reviews.author: BlueMtGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, solidly built, and an easy instructional video. I'm new to the Cajon, but i'm liking what i'm hearing.
customer_reviews.author: SFC Smokey

customer_reviews.title: serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: good for what it is designed to do. Well made. wished it was a little bigger but it works
customer_reviews.author: Chris Irish

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. A little shorter than others but good clean consistent sound. Seems pretty well built.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Cat

customer_reviews.title: Looked good out of the box did not play it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked good out of the box did not play it was reboxed and wrapped for Christmas but I could tell it was well made and packaged nicely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding box drum! Came neatly packed and quick! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review in progress
customer_reviews.text: It's too early to write a review I don't how to play yet.
customer_reviews.author: Josephcecil Arcenal

customer_reviews.title: simple but fun way to play rhythm with young children
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this with preK children for music and movement activities
customer_reviews.author: walter thiessen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal. This is the Cajun to get.
customer_reviews.text: Nice build quality, clear instructions, fast shipping, perfect sized box for shipping, and better sound than the competition. Not as tall as the others. Be sure to get a bag for it to keep it looking nice when you take it from gig to home.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound, easy to use. Thanks. Loved the thank you letter too. It was a gift for our pastor and he loves it. A nice addition to the worship service.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G Franck

customer_reviews.title: Plays, just got it. Would rather review when ...
customer_reviews.text: Plays, just got it. Would rather review when I've gotten used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Well made product.
customer_reviews.text: First of all Amazon more than lived up to their promise of delivery by December 24th. My soundwave cajon arrived on Dec. 21 ahead of the projected delivery date. Thanks Amazon! The cajon came well packaged and protected in the two boxes. I gave it four starts instead of five because it is slightly smaller than I thought it would be originally and it is a little on the small side for me. But overall the sound quality is good. I am quite satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my music teacher mother. Armed with a YouTube video she was able to figure out how to use the Cajon Box and will be using g it with her students. She said the quality and sound is great. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 7yo nephew (with parents permission, of course). He loves it! I have one slightly larger and look forward to many jams with him in the future. Stellar workmanship from construction to packing is easy to notice and greatly appreciated. Gave a cursory 'kick of the tires' and fine tuning with the tools provided and the sound quality is great. Thank you for helping pass the gift of music to a future generation.
customer_reviews.author: B. F. Wong

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TONE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my 1st Cajon in about 2008 & still have been using it. Was fat, bulky, no snare, but was a great workhorse. This new one is compact & sounds great!!! As a 47 year old full time musician, producer, booking agent, promoter I am thrilled with this product!!!! Sounds great!!!!!! Thank you SOUNDWAVE & AMAZON!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other store bought cajon I have played
customer_reviews.text: Have been drumming for years now. I used a really fat Meinl cajon for gigs for a very long time, and just recently did I acquire this gem. I can confidently say that if you decide to invest in a quality cajon, go soundwave. Not only will you be pleased with the sound, but you will be able to actually tune the snares and impact head quite easily with the tool that is included. It also is significantly cheaper than any Meinl or LP model, and it arguably sounds better. The seat pad that is included is also the greatest thing you never thought you needed. I recommend this to all serious percussion players.
customer_reviews.author: mollie stetzer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing piece. Very wallet friendly and nice sound. Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: My son was thrilled with this. He was able to tune it and use it within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: ChristyKenner

customer_reviews.title: Good sounds come in small boxes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted a box drum and when I had the opportunity to pick this one up for $6, it was a no-brainer! After learning how to tune, and where and how to hit it, I would feel confident in a jam session or performance after only a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer - Premium Cajon Box Drum
customer_reviews.text: I've played a lot of box drums and let me be the first to say that not all are created equal. The Premium Cajon Box drum has become a new favorite in my studio and on the road due to its acoustics, look, and feel. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Correll Lashbrook

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: Just received. I like the way it looks. Will see how it sounds with other instruments.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this "Drum". Bought it for my nephew who is an aspiring musician. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic done right!
customer_reviews.text: This Box Drum is a classic done right! The aesthetics and sound for the price is unbeatable. It was definitely made with quality in mind. Time will tell, but I think this one will last for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound
customer_reviews.text: Still am feeling excited about the sound of this Cajon. The customizable tension works flawlessly and it plays very well. I am shocked at the price, it is so low for such a huge hike in quality from the other products. I am excited to see more design from this company as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Super simple while super cool
customer_reviews.text: I know it looks simple but... trust me. This is the coolest stand-alone instrument you'll ever own. There's no complicated setup or anything, just bang away.
customer_reviews.author: teaflow

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for more!
customer_reviews.text: Never thought a drum like this would have so much versatility. It's comfy, sounds great, and can be tuned easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable with a punch
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. It has great sounding snares and a good sounding kick when you hit the center of the drum all while maintaining portability. From living room jams to recording in studio, this box has never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Prall

customer_reviews.title: This is THE cajon
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! Perfect for jams with friends. Has the bass to snare range that many other cajons are lacking. And it's half the price. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connor Todd

customer_reviews.title: One of the best sounding Cajons I've ever played
customer_reviews.text: One of the best sounding Cajons I've ever played. Came extremely well packed and sounded great right out of the box. This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: David M. Bramson

product_meta.title: Soundwave Cajon Box Drum | The Original Acoustic Percussion Instrument You Sit On Wooden Drum Box with Compact and Portable Design
product_meta.description:
SOUNDWAVE PRODUCES THE BEST CAJON BOX DRUM EVER

Adjustable, Traditional Wire String Snare 

Portable Design

Play it Anywhere

Solid Wood

Seat Pad & Snare Adjuster Included

BUY THIS PREMIUM CAJON AT A FRACTION OF THE PRICE

Other big cajon brands like Meinl, Latin Percussion (LP), Pearl, and Schlagwerk charge over $100 for a comparable cajon.

This Premium Soundwave cajon is under $60!

Other cajons in this price range have a cheap, non-adjustable snare which makes an ugly buzz sound when playing. Ours doesn't! 

CLICK THE "ADD TO CART" BUTTON AT THE TOP OF THIS PAGE RIGHT NOW BEFORE THE PRICE INCREASES
feature_bullets: #PORTABLE - This multi-use cajon lets you play at home, in beatbox jam sessions with friends, or deep studio recordings.
#TUNABLE - In just seconds, you can adjust the tightness of your cajon strings for a deeper bass or snappier snare sound. Allen wrench included!

#VERSATILE - Our compact design (14.5h x 11.5w x 12d) is slightly shorter and lighter than a full-size cajon, yet produces the same deep bass tones and perfect snare sounds. A good fit for all ages and sizes!
#HANDCRAFTED - Only the highest quality wooden design. Smooth walnut tapping surface with birch body, and grippy rubber feet.
#COMFORT - Adhesive, non-slip silicone seat pad set lets you play comfier, for longer!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars53 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
